languages.text: "Трио настоятелей призывают паломников, чтобы придать происходящее огласке. С точки зрения дипломатии Орден Молота не выказывает угроз, но подразумевается, что гнев верующих может обрушиться на Механикус, если техножрецы не отступят".

"The trio of prelates have called upon pilgrims to mobilise — a tactic for spreading awareness of the present situation. In diplomatic terms, the Order of the Hammer has not made any threats; however, there is a clear implication that, unless the Tech-Priests back down, the Mechanicus risk incurring the wrath of the faithful."
languages.original_text: "Трио настоятелей призывают паломников, чтобы придать происходящее огласке. С точки зрения дипломатии Орден Молота не выказывает угроз, но подразумевается, что гнев верующих может обрушиться на Механикус, если техножрецы не отступят".

traits.locale_text: "The trio of prelates have invited pilgrims in order to spread awareness of the current situation. In diplomatic terms, the Order of the Hammer has not made any threats, but the implication is that the wrath of the faithful may befall the Mechanicus unless the Tech-Priests back down."

"The trio of prelates have invited pilgrims in order to spread awareness of the current situation. In diplomatic terms, the Order of the Hammer has not made any threats, but the implication is that the wrath of the faithful may befall the Mechanicus unless the Tech-Priests back down."

"The trio of prelates have called upon pilgrims to mobilise — a tactic for spreading awareness of the present situation. In diplomatic terms, the Order of the Hammer has not made any threats; however, there is a clear implication that, unless the Tech-Priests back down, the Mechanicus risk incurring the wrath of the faithful."

"The trio of prelates have called upon pilgrims to mobilise — a tactic for spreading awareness of the present situation. In diplomatic terms, the Order of the Hammer has not made any threats; however, there is a clear implication that, unless the Tech-Priests back down, the Mechanicus risk incurring the wrath of the faithful."

languages.text: "Die drei Prälaten haben Pilger mobilisiert ... eine Taktik, um ein Bewusstsein für die aktuelle Situation zu schaffen. Aus diplomatischer Sicht hat der Orden des Hammers zwar keine Drohungen ausgesprochen, aber eindeutig impliziert, dass das Mechanicus den Zorn der Gläubigen riskiert, falls sich die Techpriester nicht zurückziehen."
languages.original_text: "The trio of prelates have called upon pilgrims to mobilise — a tactic for spreading awareness of the present situation. In diplomatic terms, the Order of the Hammer has not made any threats; however, there is a clear implication that, unless the Tech-Priests back down, the Mechanicus risk incurring the wrath of the faithful."

traits.locale_text: "Die drei Prälaten haben Pilger mobilisiert ... eine Taktik, um ein Bewusstsein für die aktuelle Situation zu schaffen. Aus diplomatischer Sicht hat der Orden des Hammers zwar keine Drohungen ausgesprochen, aber eindeutig impliziert, dass das Mechanicus den Zorn der Gläubigen riskiert, falls sich die Techpriester nicht zurückziehen."

languages.text: "Üç piskopos, mevcut durum hakkında farkındalık yaratma taktiği olarak hacıları seferber olmaya çağırdı. Çekiç Tarikatı, diplomatik anlamda herhangi bir tehditte bulunmadı. Ancak Tekno Rahipler geri adım atmazsa Mechanicus'un, inançlıların gazabına uğrama riskiyle karşı karşıya kalacağına dair açık bir imada bulundular."
languages.original_text: "The trio of prelates have called upon pilgrims to mobilise — a tactic for spreading awareness of the present situation. In diplomatic terms, the Order of the Hammer has not made any threats; however, there is a clear implication that, unless the Tech-Priests back down, the Mechanicus risk incurring the wrath of the faithful."

traits.locale_text: "Üç piskopos, mevcut durum hakkında farkındalık yaratma taktiği olarak hacıları seferber olmaya çağırdı. Çekiç Tarikatı, diplomatik anlamda herhangi bir tehditte bulunmadı. Ancak Tekno Rahipler geri adım atmazsa Mechanicus'un, inançlıların gazabına uğrama riskiyle karşı karşıya kalacağına dair açık bir imada bulundular."

languages.text: «El trío de prelados ha convocado una movilización general de peregrinos; una táctica para concienciar al pueblo sobre la situación actual. En términos diplomáticos, la Orden del Martillo no ha formulado ninguna amenaza; sin embargo, existe la inequívoca implicación de que, a menos que los tecnosacerdotes reculen, el Mechanicus se arriesga a incurrir en la cólera de los fieles».
languages.original_text: "The trio of prelates have called upon pilgrims to mobilise — a tactic for spreading awareness of the present situation. In diplomatic terms, the Order of the Hammer has not made any threats; however, there is a clear implication that, unless the Tech-Priests back down, the Mechanicus risk incurring the wrath of the faithful."

traits.locale_text: «El trío de prelados ha convocado una movilización general de peregrinos; una táctica para concienciar al pueblo sobre la situación actual. En términos diplomáticos, la Orden del Martillo no ha formulado ninguna amenaza; sin embargo, existe la inequívoca implicación de que, a menos que los tecnosacerdotes reculen, el Mechanicus se arriesga a incurrir en la cólera de los fieles».

languages.text: “三位教长已经开始呼吁所有朝圣者前往荒寂岩地，让所有信徒意识到当前的状况。尽管在外交层面上，重锤修会尚没有发出明确的威胁，但如果那些技术神甫拒绝退让，他们恐怕就要面对信徒接踵而至的怒火了。”
languages.original_text: "The trio of prelates have called upon pilgrims to mobilise — a tactic for spreading awareness of the present situation. In diplomatic terms, the Order of the Hammer has not made any threats; however, there is a clear implication that, unless the Tech-Priests back down, the Mechanicus risk incurring the wrath of the faithful."

traits.locale_text: “三位教长已经开始呼吁所有朝圣者前往荒寂岩地，让所有信徒意识到当前的状况。尽管在外交层面上，重锤修会尚没有发出明确的威胁，但如果那些技术神甫拒绝退让，他们恐怕就要面对信徒接踵而至的怒火了。”

languages.text: « Le trio de prélats a employé une tactique efficace pour mettre en lumière la situation et a appelé les pèlerins à se mobiliser. D'un point de vue diplomatique, l'Ordre du Marteau n'a proféré aucune menace. Toutefois, il est clairement sous-entendu que si les technoprêtres ne cèdent pas, l'Adeptus Mechanicus encourt la colère des fidèles. »
languages.original_text: "The trio of prelates have called upon pilgrims to mobilise — a tactic for spreading awareness of the present situation. In diplomatic terms, the Order of the Hammer has not made any threats; however, there is a clear implication that, unless the Tech-Priests back down, the Mechanicus risk incurring the wrath of the faithful."

traits.locale_text: « Le trio de prélats a employé une tactique efficace pour mettre en lumière la situation et a appelé les pèlerins à se mobiliser. D'un point de vue diplomatique, l'Ordre du Marteau n'a proféré aucune menace. Toutefois, il est clairement sous-entendu que si les technoprêtres ne cèdent pas, l'Adeptus Mechanicus encourt la colère des fidèles. »

languages.text: 「あの人間の高位聖職者三人は、巡礼者に動くように呼びかけた。今の状況を広めるための手だ。外交上は、ハンマー騎士団は脅しはしていない。だがテック司祭が引かなければ、信徒の怒りを買うのはメカニカスだと、はっきり匂わせている」
languages.original_text: "The trio of prelates have called upon pilgrims to mobilise — a tactic for spreading awareness of the present situation. In diplomatic terms, the Order of the Hammer has not made any threats; however, there is a clear implication that, unless the Tech-Priests back down, the Mechanicus risk incurring the wrath of the faithful."

traits.locale_text: 「あの人間の高位聖職者三人は、巡礼者に動くように呼びかけた。今の状況を広めるための手だ。外交上は、ハンマー騎士団は脅しはしていない。だがテック司祭が引かなければ、信徒の怒りを買うのはメカニカスだと、はっきり匂わせている。」
